alert.note: Alert for Shishmaref (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 07 at 12:42PM AKST until December 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Diomede. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow squalls will come with heavy snow, strong winds becoming north and whiteout conditions at times beginning this afternoon and continuing through Saturday. Strong north winds and temperatures in the teens may lead to freezing spray and light ice accumulation at Diomede Thursday through Saturday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
